scripts.test: cypress run --env allure=true --headless && allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report
scripts.test:head: cypress run --env allure=true --headed && allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report
scripts.test:open:reporter: cypress run --env allure=true --headless && allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open  allure-report
